thread.title: Chris Harker
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Chris Harker

author: Chris Harker
title: Chris Harker
text:
This is the first time i have used Servicing Stop and i am very impressed, they sent reminders and also called me to confirm collection times and the costs of oil and notified me of any advisories and whether i wanted certain work to be carried out. The price was great and the whole experience was worth every penny.
I will recommend this company to all of my family and friends and have already reserved my service next year for a discounted price.
